content: cast on tip try the top on or measure and knit it to the length that fits the intended the hem will add approx 2 5 cm 1 inch the sample ends with a mc color stripe break cc yarn and continue with mc the hem change to smaller needles and work as follows rd1 k to bor round 2 *k1 p1* repeat ** to bor repeat round 2 until 8 rds have been worked total bind off with italian bind-off or another stretchy bind-off sleeves in this section the sleeve stitches are placed back on your main size needles and 1 stitch in each of the 4 4 8 12 20 28 32 36 36 underarm sts is picked up and knitted bor will be in the middle of the underarm sts 8 knitting of course milo decreases are made along the sleeve at the same time remember to change between mc and cc for your stripe pattern to work sleeves as sample right sleeve pick up with the yarn color you have reached in your stripe pattern and continue the stripe pattern until there are an additional 4 cc stripes on the sleeves then break cc and work the rest of the rest of the sleeve in mc at the same time work decreases as described below left sleeve pick up with the yarn color you have reached in your stripe pattern and continue the stripe pattern until there are an additional 3 mc stripes on the sleeves then break mc and work the rest of the rest of the sleeve in cc at the same time work decreases as described below both cuffs are worked in mc total st count 66 70 74 80 88 98 110 118 126 sts work 2 cm / 0 75 inches of stockinette in the round as follows round 1 k to end then repeat rd1 while at the same time working sleeve decreases as described below until sleeve is finished sleeve decreases while working stockinette in the round on every 14 12 11 9 10 8 5 4 4th round work a decrease round as described below decrease round k1 k2tog k to 3 sts before bor ssk k1 2 sts decreased work a total of 10 11 12 14 12 15 21 24 26 decrease rds total st count 46 48 50 52 64 68 68 70 74 sts continue stockinette in the round while at the same time working either with mc for the right sleeve or cc for the left sleeve until the sleeve measures 41 5 40 5 38 5 37 5 37 36 35 33 32 cm/ 16 25 16 15 25 14 75 14 5 14 25 13 75 13 12 5 inches make your own choice based on your preferred length the cuff measures approx 2 5 cm / 1 inch break cc yarn and continue with mc the cuffs change to smaller needles work as follows rd1 k to
